response.overview: FBI Agent Will Graham, who retired after catching Hannibal Lecter, returns to duty to engage in a risky cat-and-mouse game with Lecter to capture a new killer.
response.tagline: It's just you and me now, sport…
response.title: Manhunter

titles.title: Red Dragon: The Curse of Hannibal Lecter
